snippet.title: The Most Promising Game We'll Never Play
snippet.description:
Everhaven (Project Dragon) was recently cancelled by Phoenix Labs. Here is everything we know about the game, with some new footage and information!

Sign the petition to #BringBackProjectDragon: https://chng.it/rQb9fsBZRK

Developers Featured:
Phoenix Labs: https://phxlabs.ca/
Airborn Studios: https://www.artstation.com/airbornstudios/
Andy Hansen: https://artstation.com/andyh/
Charlène Le Scanff: https://www.artstation.com/catell-ruz/
Cris Velasco: http://crisvelasco.com/
Lucas St. Martin: https://www.lucasstmartin.com/
Nicholas Kole: https://nicholaskole.art
Revenant: https://revenant.tv/

I would like to thank all the developers who worked on this game! I added those whose individual work was featured, but I'd be happy to add your name if you worked on Everhaven. Simply leave a comment here or DM @Playwith_Josh on Twitter/X.

Thank you!

00:00 Introduction
00:18 Development
04:53 5 Main Features
10:42 Other Features
12:56 Character Creation
15:18 A Bit of Hope?

Visit my shop: https://mygaminggarden.com/

Support me on Ko-fi: https://ko-fi.com/gaminggarden
X: @Playwith_Josh
TikTok: @mygaminggarden
Join our Discord: https://discord.com/invite/k3BxZRa

Visit my Amazon Storefront for recommended products & games:
